snippet.title: Half-Life Alyx: LEVITATION - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Enjoy 7 minutes of smooth uncut gameplay footage from one of LEVITATION's chapters: Dig Deep.

Special thanks to @EchoSmoker for recording gameplay.

Half-Life: Alyx LEVITATION is expected to release on the Steam Workshop early Q3 of 2022.

The mod will be free of charge for owners of the game, and is will be a 4-5 hour experience for the average player.
